products.description: A perfect fuzzy, fluffy, Bucky Badger!
products.name: Bucky Badger Plush

products.description: Show off your Wisconsin spirit with these Bucky Badger leggings! These leggings feature a red spacedye detail down either side. They have a full color Bucky Badger on the left side and come complete with side pockets for your phone or other belongings. They're perfect for game day or wearing to the gym!
products.name: Wisconsin Leggings

products.description: Get ready to Jump Around with this #GameDay Bucky stuffed animal. The 12″ plush features a Jump Around long sleeve, red and white bib overalls, Wisconsin motion W face tattoo, and fun red and white shoes! A must for any Wisconsin fan!
products.name: Game Day Bucky Plush

products.description: Cheer on the Wisconsin Badgers in style with these Bucky Badger leggings. Comfy and stretchy, the allover print will be sure to turn heads! Perfect with a Jump Around tee on game day!
products.name: Bucky Badger Leggings

products.description: The most comfortable pillow to help show off your Wisconsin spirit! This cloud pillow features a white motion W on the front and Wisconsin Badgers lettering around the outside.
products.name: W Cloud Pillow

products.description: Add an extremely soft, comfy pillow to your bed with this awesome Northwest Bucky Badger Pillow Cloud. In the shape of a ball, this pillow is in the color red and features Bucky Badger on the front.
products.name: Bucky Badger Pillow

products.description: Show off your love of Bucky Badger with this fun keychain! This keychain features a plush Bucky Badger. It's the perfect addition to your Wisconsin lanyard or keyring.
products.name: Bucky Badger Keychain

products.description: Show your support for Wisconsin football in this stylish red hat. It features an embroidered graphic of 'Wisconsin Football' and a motion W, as well as the Big Ten logo on the right side. Features Heat°gear technology, which is designed for temperatures above 75° and will keep you looking and feeling cool all day long.
products.name: Wisconsin Football Hat

products.description: This lightweight and breathable visor is perfect for game day! The ArmourVent technology delivers a light, stretchy, durable, and fast-drying fabric. The visor is detailed with an embroidered motion W on the front. The adjustable back features a soft hook & loop Velcro.
products.name: White Wisconsin Visor

products.description: You will be ready for football season with this Jump Around t-shirt! The red tee features 'Jump Around' with a printed Wisconsin motion W and an Under Armour logo across the front. The soft shirt feels great and wicks away sweat on hot days.
products.name: Jump Around Shirt

products.description: You can show off your Wisconsin Badger pride with these super soft joggers. The cozy material feels soft and luxurious making them comfy and stylish. The joggers feature a drawstring waist, side pockets, and closed bottom.
products.name: Women's Wisconsin Cuddle Joggers

products.description: These super comfy sweatpants are the perfect way to watch the Badger game! The left leg feature a printed 'Wisconsin' and a Wisconsin motion W. The pants are detailed with an elastic drawstring waist, side pockets, and an open leg.
products.name: Wisconsin Sweatpants

products.description: Stay feeling cool during hot Madison summers or when working out at the Nat with these loose Under Armour Wisconsin Qualifier Shorts that have an ultra-lightweight, stretchy woven fabric that delivers superior mobility. The Moisture Transport System wicks sweat and dries fast. There is an encased elastic waistband with an external drawcord, a notch at the hem which allows for better lateral movement and mesh hand pockets.
products.name: Wisconsin Qualifier Woven Short

products.description: These shorts have it all, strategic mesh, pockets, wide elastic waistband, and Wisconsin Badger logos! You will be ready to run faster with these woven shorts!
products.name: Wisconsin Running Shorts
